text: @CervicalCancerAwareness#CervicalCancerDisparities #PreventionTips #VaccinationIsKeyDid you know that cervical cancer is a preventable disease? 🚨 Let's work together to eradicate it within our lifetime! 💪According to Wright, an HPV test can detect the virus that causes cervical cancer. 🧬🔬Follow @ACOG_org guidelines for cervical cancer screening: 📅Ages 21-29: Pap test every 3 years 💉Massachusetts residents, check out free breast and cervical cancer screening resources! 🎨👍If diagnosed with cervical cancer, consult an oncologist promptly for treatment. 🏥❤️Let's spread awareness and take action against cervical cancer! 🌈💪
